monsters.name: Kobold
monsters.description: Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids with a talent for traps. They often worship dragons and may serve more powerful draconic creatures.

monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.description: Goblins are short, ugly humanoids that stand just over 3 feet tall. They have flat faces, broad noses, pointed ears, and small sharp fangs.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.description: Orcs are aggressive humanoids that raid, pillage, and battle other creatures. They stand around 6 feet tall with stooped postures, low foreheads, and pig-like faces.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.description: Skeletons are the animated bones of the dead, brought to unlife through foul magic. They are typically used as guards or shock troops.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.description: Zombies are the animated corpses of the dead, often used as disposable soldiers by necromancers. They shamble forward with mindless determination.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.description: Giant spiders are aggressive predators that spin elaborate webs to trap their prey. Their venom can weaken even the mightiest warrior.

monsters.name: Wolf
monsters.description: Wolves are pack hunters known for their cunning and ferocity. They can be found in most temperate environments.

monsters.name: Dire Wolf
monsters.description: Dire wolves are prehistoric wolves that grow to massive size. They hunt in packs and can bring down prey much larger than themselves.

monsters.name: Ogre
monsters.description: Ogres are hulking brutes standing over 9 feet tall. They are known for their cruelty, stupidity, and fondness for humanoid flesh.

monsters.name: Owlbear
monsters.description: Owlbears are notoriously vicious and powerful predators. They appear to be a bizarre hybrid of a giant owl and a bear.

monsters.name: Troll
monsters.description: Trolls are fearsome creatures known for their incredible regeneration. Only fire and acid can prevent a troll from healing its wounds.

monsters.name: Adult White Dragon
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 30 ft., fly 200 ft. (poor), swim 60 ft.

monsters.name: Young Red Dragon
monsters.description: Red dragons are the most covetous of the true dragons. They are terrifying, cruel, and merciless. They have a massive breath weapon of fire.
